abstract.t: Current methods of publishing certificates in directory services arerestricted to just certificates. This document provides a method ofpublishing certificates with secondary support information such asthe SMimeCapabilities attribute (containing bulk algorithm support)in a way that is both authenticated and bound to a givencertificate.This draft is being discussed on the 'ietf-smime' mailing list. Tojoin the list, send a message to <ietf-smime-request@imc.org> withthe single word 'subscribe' in the body of the message. Also, thereis a Web site for the mailing list at <http://www.imc.org/ietf-smime>.
